title: Group component
description: Schema that describes the layout configuration for a Group component.

group.title: Group
group.description: Data model binding for repeating group connection to a group in the data model

textResourceBindings.title: Text resource bindings
textResourceBindings.description: Text resource bindings for a component.

title.title: Label
title.description: The title/label text for the group

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text for the group

help.title: Help text
help.description: The help text for the group

shortName.title: Short name
shortName.description: The short name for the group (used in validation messages) (optional). If it is not specified, 'title' text is used.

children.title: Children
children.description: An array of the "id" of child components belonging to the group.

hiddenRow.title: Hidden row
hiddenRow.description: Boolean to decide whether the row should be displayed.

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Alternatives for edit view of repeating group

panel.title: Panel
panel.description: Alternatives for panel view of repeating group

showGroupingIndicator.title: Show grouping indicator
showGroupingIndicator.description: Boolean to decide whether a vertical line indicating grouping of fields should be visible. Only relevant for non-repeating groups.

maxCount.title: Maximum count
maxCount.description: The maximum number of iterations of a group. Only relevant if group is repeating.

rowsBefore.title: Static rows before
rowsBefore.description: An array of rows to be rendered before the group table (using Grid component configuration)

rowsAfter.title: Static rows after
rowsAfter.description: An array of rows to be rendered after the group table (using Grid component configuration)

tableHeaders.title: Table Headers
tableHeaders.description: An array of the id of child components that should be included as table headers. If not defined all components are shown.

tableColumns.title: Table Columns
tableColumns.description: An object containing key-value pairs where the key is a table header and the value is an object containing settings for the headers column

editInTable.title: Edit in table
editInTable.description: Boolean to decide whether the component should be editable in table view

showInExpandedEdit.title: Show in expanded edit
showInExpandedEdit.description: Boolean to decide whether the component should be shown in the expanded edit view

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Settings for the components grid. Used for controlling horizontal alignment.
